treatment.description: Plants 2–4 dm. Leaf blades oblong to oblanceolate or elliptic, (2–)3–5 × 0.8–2.5(–3) cm, tomentose abaxially, margins plane. Involucres (2.5–)3–3.5 mm. Perianths yellow.
treatment.habitat: sandy to clayey flats and slopes
treatment.discussion: Variety thompsoniae is found infrequently in Kane and Washington counties, Utah, and in Mohave County, Arizona.
